plot: Immersing and culturing itself on an ever-developing planet, it looked to the future as an "era of no loss" Day by Day, the empty spots on the map were filled. Little by little, complacency...
plot_en: Immersing and culturing itself on an ever-developing planet, it looked to the future as an "era of no loss" Day by Day, the empty spots on the map were filled. Little by little, complacency...
plot_es: Immersing and culturing itself on an ever-developing planet, it looked to the future as an "era of no loss" Day by Day, the empty spots on the map were filled. Little by little, complacency...
title: Cerebral
